# ceph_user (Resource)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `capabilities` (String) The capabilities string (e.g., 'mon 'allow r' osd 'allow *'')
- `name` (String) The user entity name (e.g., client.app)

### Read-Only

- `key` (String, Sensitive) The exported keyring/key for the user
